page.title: 09A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On a Sunday we usually go out for the day.This last Sunday we went to Newcastle because it was my cousin's birthday.We got up at 9am and had our breakfast of toast and tea or coffee. Our journey started about 10am and when we got to Newcastle we went to the {Quayside Market.}A new dress and shoes were bought for me.After that it was about 12:45 so we went to my Aunt's house and she had lunch ready for us.For lunch we had chicken, carrots,roast potatoes and gravy and for pudding we had strawberry flan with ice cream.When we had finished our lunch my cousin and I went out to play.We went to the park to play on the swings and slide.Returning to my Aunt's house we had a little tea party and there was all sorts of food to eat.After tea we listened to Top of the Pops till 7pm then we went home.
